org.gbif.common.search.service

Class SolrSearchSuggestService<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,ST extends T,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest<P>,SUGT,SSUGT extends SUGT,RSUG extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.common.search.service.SolrSearchService<T,P,ST,R>
      • org.gbif.common.search.service.SolrSearchSuggestService<T,P,ST,R,SUGT,SSUGT,RSUG>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of request object
    R - Type of response object
    P - the search parameter enum
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.gbif.api.service.common.SearchService<T,P,R>, org.gbif.api.service.common.SuggestService<SUGT,P,RSUG>

    public class SolrSearchSuggestService<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,ST extends T,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest<P>,SUGT,SSUGT extends SUGT,RSUG extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<P>>
extends SolrSearchService<T,P,ST,R>
implements org.gbif.api.service.common.SuggestService<SUGT,P,RSUG>
    Extension of SolrSearchService that implements the SuggestService. This class is generic implementation that can be re-used for different and more implementations.

      • SolrSearchSuggestService

        public SolrSearchSuggestService(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient solrClient,
                                Class<T> searchType,
                                Class<ST> searchSolrType,
                                Class<P> searchParameterType,
                                Map<String,org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery.ORDER> primarySortOrder,
                                Class<SSUGT> suggestAnnotatedClass)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        solrClient - Solr server instance, this abstract type is used because it can hold instance of HttpSolrClient or EmbeddedSolrServer
        searchType - of the results content
        primarySortOrder - ordered fields used for an optional sort order in every search

      • SolrSearchSuggestService

        public SolrSearchSuggestService(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient solrClient,
                                @Nullable
                                String requestHandler,
                                Class<T> searchType,
                                Class<ST> searchSolrType,
                                Class<P> searchParameterType,
                                Map<String,org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery.ORDER> primarySortOrder,
                                Class<SSUGT> suggestAnnotatedClass)
        Constructor for regular search/suggest operations. Doesn't contain the default order for suggest results.
        Parameters:
        solrServer - Solr server instance, this abstract type is used because it can hold instance of CommonsHttpSolrServer or EmbeddedSolrServer
        requestHandler - specific Solr request handler to be used
        searchType - of the results content
        primarySortOrder - ordered fields used for an optional sort order in every search

      • SolrSearchSuggestService

        public SolrSearchSuggestService(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient solrClient,
                                @Nullable
                                String requestHandler,
                                Class<T> searchType,
                                Class<ST> searchSolrType,
                                Class<P> searchParameterType,
                                Map<String,org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery.ORDER> primarySortOrder,
                                Map<String,org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery.ORDER> suggestSortOrder,
                                Class<SSUGT> suggestAnnotatedClass)
        Full constructor.
        Parameters:
        solrClient - Solr client instance, this abstract type is used because it can hold instance of CommonsHttpSolrServer or EmbeddedSolrServer
        requestHandler - specific Solr request handler to be used
        searchType - of the results content
        primarySortOrder - ordered fields used for an optional sort order in every search
        suggestSortOrder - ordered fields used for an optional sort order in every suggest operation
